org.mini2Dx.core.screen

Interface ScreenManager<T extends GameScreen>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GameResizeListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicScreenManager

    public interface ScreenManager<T extends GameScreen>
extends GameResizeListener
    Updates and renders GameScreens and Transitions between them

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addGameScreen(T screen)
      Adds a GameScreen to this manager
      void enterGameScreen(int id, Transition transitionOut, Transition transitionIn)
      Begins a transition to a new GameScreen
      T getGameScreen(int id)
      Returns the GameScreen with the given id
      void interpolate(GameContainer gc, float alpha)
      Interpolate between the previous and current state
      boolean isTransitioning()
      Returns if the ScreenManager is moving between Screens
      void onPause() 
      void onResume() 
      void render(GameContainer gc, Graphics g)
      Renders the current GameScreen and any Transition that may be occurring
      void update(GameContainer gc, float delta)
      Updates the current GameScreen and any Transition that may be occurring

      • Methods inherited from interface org.mini2Dx.core.game.GameResizeListener

        onResize

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(GameContainer gc,
          float delta)
        Updates the current GameScreen and any Transition that may be occurring
        Parameters:
        gc - The GameContainer that is updating this ScreenManager
        delta - The time since the last update

      • interpolate

        void interpolate(GameContainer gc,
               float alpha)
        Interpolate between the previous and current state
        Parameters:
        alpha - The interpolation alpha value

      • render

        void render(GameContainer gc,
          Graphics g)
        Renders the current GameScreen and any Transition that may be occurring
        Parameters:
        gc - The GameContainer that is rendering this ScreenManager
        g - The Graphics context available for rendering

      • onPause

        void onPause()

      • onResume

        void onResume()

      • enterGameScreen

        void enterGameScreen(int id,
                   Transition transitionOut,
                   Transition transitionIn)
        Begins a transition to a new GameScreen
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the GameScreen to transition to
        transitionOut - The outgoing Transition, e.g. fade out
        transitionIn - The incoming Transition, e.g. fade in

      • addGameScreen

        void addGameScreen(T screen)
        Adds a GameScreen to this manager
        Parameters:
        screen - The GameScreen to be added

      • getGameScreen

        T getGameScreen(int id)
        Returns the GameScreen with the given id
        Parameters:
        id - The id to search for
        Returns:
        Null if there is no such GameScreen registered with this manager

      • isTransitioning

        boolean isTransitioning()
        Returns if the ScreenManager is moving between Screens
        Returns:
        False if there are no Transitions active
